at.ac.tuwien.ims.svn.phantasmophobia

Class GameSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • at.ac.tuwien.ims.svn.phantasmophobia.GameSurfaceView

  • public class GameSurfaceView
extends SurfaceView
    Created by Emil Etlinger on 24.10.2015. everything happens in the view, a touch takes place and the resulting image gets displayed. load tower and sven images and draw them on canvas starts gameloop
